img_text: Complex Today COM PLEX YouTube/Ayecode YNW MELLY'S MOM SAYS RAPPER'S ALLEGED VICTIM THREATENED HER A video uploaded to YouTube on March 6 appears to show the mother of the incarcerated rapper calling out YNW Sakchaser, one of Melly's two ofriends and fellow rappers that he's accused of killing. 'Don't ever come for me, because my credentials is real, the woman in the video warns before boasting of her big guns. She also advises Sakchaser against 'coming for' her and threatening her with a gun. It's unclear when the footage-which purports to show YNW Melly's mom calling out one of the men he allegedly shot dead-is from.
